name: Mimetic Cypher
description:
This demo was created by Ahmed Hisham and Diego Saldivar for the Playing With Games course in Cologne Game Lab. Music by Kevin MacLeod. Available under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported license.

The game is an early proof of concept where we intend to demonstrate the basic mechanics of the game: a 3D Simon Says.

In further iterations we would add a story about hacking some government mainframe and other cyberpunkish themes.
